languages.text: Пустотелый Виктор осыпает вас и весь ваш протекторат проклятиями — вы еще пожалеете о своем решении! Готовьтесь к бою, пиратское судно заряжает орудия!

traits.locale_text: Пустотелый Виктор осыпает вас и всю вашу торговую империю проклятиями — вы еще пожалеете о своем решении! Готовьтесь к бою, пиратское судно заряжает орудия!

languages.text: Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!
languages.original_text: Пустотелый Виктор осыпает вас и весь ваш протекторат проклятиями — вы еще пожалеете о своем решении! Готовьтесь к бою, пиратское судно заряжает орудия!

traits.locale_text: Hollow-Body Victor spews curses at you and yoru entire trade empire. You'll be sorry for that decision yet! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!
Hollow-Body Victor spews curses at you and yoru entire trade empire. You'll be sorry for that decision yet! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!
Hollow-Body Victor spews curses at you and your entire trade empire. You will yet regret that decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!
Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!
Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire trade empire — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!
Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!

languages.text: “空心”咒骂着你与你的整个王朝，说你一定会为这个决定感到后悔！海盗的舰船正在装填炮弹！准备战斗！
languages.original_text: Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!

traits.locale_text: “空心”咒骂着你与你的整个王朝，说你一定会为这个决定感到后悔！海盗的舰船正在装填炮弹！准备战斗！

languages.text: Corazón Hueco os maldice a ti y a todo tu protectorado. ¡Lamentarás esta decisión! ¡La nave pirata carga sus armas! ¡Prepárate para luchar!
languages.original_text: Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!

traits.locale_text: Corazón Hueco os maldice a ti y a todo tu protectorado. ¡Lamentarás esta decisión! ¡La nave pirata carga sus armas! ¡Prepárate para luchar!

languages.text: ホロウ・ハートは、こちらと保護領全体に呪いをかける。お前はこの判断を後悔するぞ！という。海賊船は砲撃の用意をしている！戦闘の準備にかかれ！
languages.original_text: Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!

traits.locale_text: ホロウ・ハートは、こちらと保護領全体に呪いをかける。お前はこの判断を後悔するぞ！という。海賊船は砲撃の用意をしている！戦闘の準備にかかれ！

languages.text: Hohlherz überzieht dich und dein gesamtes Protektorat mit Flüchen — du wirst diese Entscheidung bereuen! Das Piratenschiff lädt seine Waffen! Bereitmachen zur Schlacht!
languages.original_text: Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!

traits.locale_text: Hohlherz überzieht dich und dein gesamtes Protektorat mit Flüchen — du wirst diese Entscheidung bereuen! Das Piratenschiff lädt seine Waffen! Bereitmachen zur Schlacht!

languages.text: Le Cœur-creux vous maudit, vous et votre protectorat tout entier. Vous allez regretter cette décision ! Le vaisseau pirate arme ses canons ! Préparez-vous au combat !
languages.original_text: Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!

traits.locale_text: Le Cœur-creux vous maudit, vous et votre protectorat tout entier. Vous allez regretter cette décision ! Le vaisseau pirate arme ses canons ! Préparez-vous au combat !

languages.text: Yüreksiz Victor, sana ve tüm protektorana lanetler yağdırıp bu kararından pişmanlık duyacağını belirtiyor. Korsan gemisi silahlarını hazırlıyor! Savaşa!
languages.original_text: Hollow Heart heaps curses upon you and your entire protectorate — you will regret this decision! The pirate ship is loading its guns! Prepare for battle!
